sourcesContent:
import styled from 'styled-components' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import Announcement from '../components/Announcement' import Newsletter from '../components/Newsletter' import Footer from '../components/Footer' const Container = styled.div` ` const Wrapper = styled.div` display: flex; padding: 50px; ` const ImgCon = styled.div` flex: 1; ` const Image = styled.img` width: 100%; height: 90vh; object-fit: cover ` const InfCon = styled.div` flex: 1; ` const Title = styled.h1` ` const Desc = styled.p` ` const Price = styled.span` ` const Product = () => { return ( Joo Jun Jacket - Material: Canvas blended Poly
- Texture: Printed directly on the product
- Size: 40cm X 30cm X 12cm
- Shockproof compartment fits 15 inch laptop
- Brand: JUN.
- Production: Vietnam
- Colors and textures are designed by the design team JunJun
$20,00
) } export default Product
